title: Script font
content:
Hi,

I'm really hoping that someone can help me find the script font used here.

Thanks in advance,

Jacob

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317053123im_/http:/typophile.com/files/a9f3e44acdeefdf807721a9c8ade11dc_3848.png)

Font: 

 Brasserie 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317053123/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: saeglopur

comments.content: I can't help you with this specific one but I know Jorgen tends to use script faces like [So Prolix](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317053123/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/so-prolix/) and [Handsome](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317053123/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/handsome/). Those are in a similar style but maybe someone can chime in with the actual typeface.
[Brasserie](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317053123/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wilton/brasserie) by Wilton Foundry Robbie de Villiers
